short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces specific words from websites with their Wonk counterpart.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wonkify your life by using this simple word switcher extension

liberal -> liberal Wonk
conservative -> conservative Wonk
democratic -> liberal Wonky
politician -> wonk
republican -> conservative wonk
president -> Head Wonk
senator -> Senate Wonk
representative -> House of Reps. Wonk
Sen. -> Sen. Wnk.
Washington -> Wonkland
Politics -> Wonk Studies
POLITICS -> Wonk Studies
democrat -> liberal Wonk
Hillary Clinton -> Queen Wonk
Clinton -> Queen Wonk
Judge Judy -> Judge "The Wonk" Judy
American University -> Wonk University
AU -> Wonk University
